title: Too much flashin in Control Example
description: When running the control example and resizing the window in the vertical direction only, there is excessive flashing.
OB: Currently, all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames are flashing when resizing the window in the vertical direction which is not intended.
EB: The expected behavior is that only the bottom edge of the outermost frames should be repainted when resizing the window in the vertical direction.
SR:
To reproduce the issue: 
1. Run the control example. 
2. Resize the window in the vertical direction only. 
3. Observe that all tabs in the TabFolder and all Frames are flashing.
